attributes.action: Agree that Birmingham is the second city
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For many years Birmingham has been recognised as the second city but now it seems this is going to go to Manchester. This must not be allowed to happen I urge you to name it as the second city and stop any idea of changing what has stood for many years

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
